name: Mansion Mayham
description:
Disclaimer: This project is in active development, and new features, improvements, and many, many more minigames will be coming. 

After procrastinating your work until the last minute, you have to rush to finish before time runs up! Complete various maid-like jobs around the house beofre you might lose your job!

Controls:

Clicking, holding, and moving your mouse around to complete various jobs.
